availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky carpenter. Virginia native. Married Mary A. Johnson.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-020-1463. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Smyth County, District 60, p. 195. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Highland County, Madison, p. 215. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Elizaville, p. 3. William Wade Hinshaw, et al., comp., Encyclopedia of American Quaker Genealogy, 6 vols. (Baltimore, Maryland: Genealogical Publishing Co., 1991â€“1994) (accessed via Ancestry). William Wade Hinshaw and Thomas Worth Marshall, comp., Encyclopedia of American Quaker Genealogy. Supplement to Volume 1 (Washington, D.C.: n.p. 1948) (accessed via Ancestry).
